title: Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine in Odenton, MD - ChesapeakeAIM
description: Chesapeake Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine in Odenton, Maryland provides world class treatments offering hope and relief to those struggling with chronic health conditions in Maryland and the greater Mid-Atlantic region.
cleaned_text: Voted Best Acupuncture Clinic In Central Maryland - 2023 Chesapeake AIM provides world-class acupuncture and integrative medicine in Odenton, Maryland - offering hope and relief to those struggling with chronic health conditions in Maryland and the greater Mid-Atlantic region. Conditions We Treat - Low Back Pain and Sciatica - Vertebral Disc Herniation - Neck and Shoulder Pain - Headaches and Migraines - Osteoarthritis - Fibromyalgia - Heel Pain and Plantar Fasciitis - Chronic Injuries - And More - Peripheral Neuropathy - Post Stroke Recovery - Trigeminal Neuralgia - Post-Herpetic Neuralgia - Bell's Palsy - Shingles - And More Read More About [Peripheral Neuropathy](/peripheral-neuropathy/) - Infertility - Amenorrhea - Irregular Menstrual Cycle - Recurrent Miscarriage - Endometriosis - Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome - IVF/IUI Preparation - Pregnancy Wellness - And More - Rheumatoid Arthritis - Multiple Sclerosis - Irritable Bowel Syndrome - Psoriasis - Lupus - And More Our Treatments We specialize in treating chronic and seemingly hopeless cases that have not responded to standard therapies. Real Patients, Real Results Our Founder Dr. Jinell Smithmyer DACM, LAc "As an acupuncturist, I've been privileged to see many, many cases of healing, even after nothing else worked." Trained In China 7 Years Of Clinical Experience Specialized Training In Geriatrics, Infertility, And Chronic Conditions Lectures, Teaches, And Trains Other Doctors Locally And Across The United States Over 5,000 Patient Treatments Performed Let Us Help You Regain Your Health $40 Initial Consultation For New Patients Normally $240 Save $200 Call us at 410-694-7217 or use the form and we will contact you as soon as possible. © 2023 Chesapeake Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine The information contained on this website is not intended to diagnose, treat, or intervene in any medical condition. The circumstances of each patient are different. Treatment is offered only after an appropriate medical consultation and assessment. Outcomes are never guaranteed. Individual results may vary.
